se.bricole.xss.server
Interface AuthHandler

All Superinterfaces:
Module
All Known Subinterfaces:
AuthHandlerPassive
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigBasedAuthenticator
public interface AuthHandler
extends Module

A regular AuthHandler (also called "Authenticator" elsewhere in the documentation). It is an "active" authenticator in that it takes care of comparing the password itself. By contrast, a passive authenticator (AuthHandlerPassive) hands over the password to the XSS host, letting XSS do the actual authentication.
